banner.title: The stock market is
banner.text1: We take an approach that combines reliability and innovation, striving for sustainable growth over the long term.
banner.text2: Our experts continually monitor market trends and conduct fundamental analysis to identify potentially attractive opportunities.
banner.text3: Our mission is to create and manage a portfolio of assets that aligns with our goals and philosophy and supports your investment ambitions.

card1.title: We comply with MiFID II
card1.label: We strictly follow the European regulatory regime with the highest level of investor protection in the world.

card2.title: European regulation
card2.label: CySEC license and certification in all EU countries. Also accountable to SEC and BaFin.

card3.title: AFME Member
card3.label: As part of the European Financial Markets Association, we participate in the development of initiatives in the field of regulation of European capital markets.

card4.title: Reliability proven by audits
card4.label: We undergo regular audits and due diligence procedures conducted by KPMG, the SEC-authorized consortium BDO and S

card5.title: Guarantees Investor Compensation Fund
card5.label: Your funds are protected by European legislation and are insured for up to 20,000 euros.

joinUs.label: Transform the Internet
joinUs.title: Join the ecosystem.
joinUs.text: The Alphahedge Holdings ecosystem welcomes you - no matter where you are in the world, what your level of technical knowledge or familiarity with the stock market is.

card1.text: Stock recommendations for Beyond Meat and Zoom Video ranked No. 1 in Bloomberg's forecast accuracy rankings.
card1.label: Alphahedge Holdings' recommendations are the best!

card2.text: Thousands of participants from 100 countries were nominated for the award.
card2.label: Analytical center Alphahedge Holdings recognized as the best in 2020 according to Global Banking
